metadata.dc:author: Rosique, M
Hellín, D
metadata.dc:description: We show briefly an update information covering a group of conditions affecting the salivary glands. The group is difficult to classify and even have originate controversial diagnoses. The group is denominated as pseudotumors of the salivary glands. Next in the article is reported the discovery of one case of laryngeal oncocytosis.
metadata.dc:title: Seudotumores de glándulas salivares. Oncocitosis laríngea. Caso clínico.
[Pseudotumors of salivary glands. Laryngeal oncocytosis. A case report].
